2.code:
<form action='{% url 'exchange_rate_trends' %}' method='post'>
  {% csrf_token %}
  <label for='source_currency'>Source Currency:</label>
  <select id='source_currency' name='source_currency'>...</select>
  <label for='destination_currency'>Destination Currency:</label>
  <select id='destination_currency' name='destination_currency'>...</select>
  <button type='submit'>Convert</button>
</form>

from django.contrib import admin
from django.urls import path, include

urlpatterns = [
    path('admin/', admin.site.urls),
    path('', include('example_app.urls')),
]

import os

from django.core.wsgi import get_wsgi_application

os.environ.setdefault('DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE', 'example_project.settings')

application = get_wsgi_application()
